title: Law of the Cat God
description: Law of the Cat God is an idle clicker game with a unique storyline and a touch of humor. In this game, players find themselves in a future where cats have taken over the world, living a seemingly perfect life thanks to the Cat God. Players take on the role of an unnamed cat with aspirations to become the next Avatar of the Cat God. Along the way, they interact with Manny and other characters, engage in various activities, and uncover the game's lore.
